WsFed.MetadataAddress: [Federation Metadata URL for the AAD Tenant, e.g. 'https://login.microsoftonline.com/<Tenant_ID>/federationmetadata/2007-06/federationmetadata.xml']
WsFed.Wtrealm: [The App ID URI from the app registration's AAD Properties blade, e.g. 'https://<domain>.onmicrosoft.com/e9d53123-1234-4567-b672-832f911bc637']
